abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews New York premiere of Meredith Monk music piece Backlight, performed by Ensemble ACJW at Weill Recital Hall.
lead_paragraph: There was much to admire in “Backlight,” but it barely hinted at the sense of adventure and startling elements integral to much of Ms. Monk’s work.

headline.main: Review: Ensemble ACJW Performs Meredith Monk’s Instrumental ‘Backlight’
headline.print_headline: An Instrumental Work With a Vocal Touch

snippet: There was much to admire in “Backlight,” but it barely hinted at the sense of adventure and startling elements integral to much of Ms. Monk’s work.
